Exciting news from Sotheby's! They recently launched a groundbreaking $500 million art-backed bond, securitising loans against an incredible $2.85 billion worth of artworks, including masterpieces by #Rembrandt, #Warhol, and #Picasso. If you're intrigued by the idea of securitising loans for artworks or other luxury asset classes, you're not alone. My talented colleagues at Addleshaw Goddard â€“ Laura Uberoi, Marcus Collins, Taymour Keen â€“ and I have written a brief note below explaining the essence of art finance, the advantages of securitisation, and key considerations to keep in mind. Stay tuned for insights and explore the fascinating world of art finance with us! #ArtFinance #Securitisation #LuxuryAssets #AddleshawGoddard #InnovationInFinance #ArtMarket #InvestmentOpportunities #PrivateWealthFinance

INTRODUCING RESOLVED... I'm very excited to tell you all about RESOLVED...a new tool from the AG's Real Estate Disputes team. RESOLVED is a comprehensive interactive tool to help our clients and contacts navigate the complex world of contentious property. RESOLVED explores 25 tricky issues which businesses are seeking to solve, and how our bespoke approach to finding solutions can help you. Whether you're a property owner, investor, landlord, or tenant, this document explains how we will work with you to navigate the legal landscape with confidence and ease. If you have any questions or would like to discuss the tool further, please contact me or one of the team. Addleshaw Goddard #RealEstate #RealEstateDisputes #RESOLVED

Michael Burry: "If you are not using leverage, you are not trying" Somewhat in contrast to his quote, Burry typically uses put options - CDS in 2008 when he bet against the housing market. Puts are a form of leverage but they do not involve high debt levels typically associated with highly levered positions. Managing debt levels and its aspects is vital for our business at SAV, so working with lenders who understand our risk-taking approach and support our growth is essential for us, especially during volatile times. (Not sure what Michael Burry has to do with SAV but I just thought he is fun to mention!) We are pleased to share that we have secured another development facility from Coutts for our Bedford Place scheme. Coutts has been our partner for over five years across multiple schemes and sectors - we value their approach, which aligns with our philosophy when it comes to leverage and risk taking.
